subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: In the 1960’s and 70’s, Braulio Baeza was as big a star as there was in horse racing. Today, he is fighting accusations of a racetrack weight scheme.
snippet: In the 1960’s and 70’s, Braulio Baeza was as big a star as there was in horse racing. Today, he is fighting accusations of a racetrack weight scheme.
